first_para: David Hamilton (born 24 October 1950) is a British Labour Party politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Midlothian from 2001 to 2015.

full.extract: David Hamilton (born 24 October 1950) is a British Labour Party politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Midlothian from 2001 to 2015.
full.title: David Hamilton (politician)
